name: HAL
introduce:
HAL is a digital asset management tool for developers, protocols and companies to query, trigger, monitor and automate blockchain data.Notifications will be pushed to email and web2 social media in real time.
By enriching on-chain data with unique filtering layers of automation, currently consisting of 40+ DeFi recipes, HAL already helps more than 10,000 crypto individuals and professionals to listen and turn any onchain data.
